external_games.name: Rurouni Kenshin: Meiji Kenkaku Romantan - Kansen

name: Rurouni Kenshin: Meiji Kenkaku Romantan - Kansen
summary: After the epic of Kyoto, Kenshin and his group settle back into their usual cycle of adventures. Old friends like Yutaro and Misao make appearances, as do villians like Shogo Amakusa, a rogue warrior who fights with the same sword style as Kenshin.
